name: Feralscape
description:
Feralscape is an openworld feral / furry rpg animal game that I am making. It will have items you can craft, monsters to fight, have a huge to explore as well as have a huge range of animals to make your OC or customise. I want to add peoples OCs into the game as well. Its being made in Unfolding as well so its going to be very moddable as well, allowing people to make their own mods or expansions.

If you want to mod the game press F1, and it will bring up the editer lol. 

If you want to join the mailing list for getting updates http://eepurl.com/hxjhrn

Or if you want to tell me what animals to add I have a google forms here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1USGaXQt3sgTAzSvxVmbBw2wWCVB6ToAGWT6NpH_gIos/vie...
